title: The Religion of Nature Delineated
sourceDesc: The first edition of [The Religion of Nature Delineated] was published in 1722, but was (according to the advertisement to the second 1724  edition) “transcribed for the press hastily”, and contained “many _errata_ and mistakes”. Our copytext is therefore this second edition, the last to be printed in Wollaston’s lifetime. The text here derives from Stanley Tweyman’s edition (Delmar, New York\: Scholars’ Facsimiles and Reprints).
